metadata.description: Registry of all available agents for the LSTM frequency extraction project

general-purpose.description: General-purpose agent for researching complex questions, searching for code, and executing multi-step tasks
general-purpose.when_to_use: Default choice for most coding tasks, file operations, and general development work

Explore.description: Fast agent specialized for exploring codebases
Explore.when_to_use: When you need to quickly find files, search for keywords, or understand codebase structure

Plan.description: Fast agent specialized for planning and analysis without execution
Plan.when_to_use: When you need to plan implementation steps or gather information without making changes

signal-validation-expert.description: Signal processing expert for validating synthetic signal generation
signal-validation-expert.specialization: Data generation validation for LSTM frequency extraction
capabilities: FFT analysis for frequency content validation
Dataset structure validation (40,000 rows, correct shape)
critical_checks: Randomization happens in loop over samples (NOT vectorized)
Different seeds produce different noise patterns

lstm-state-debugger.description: Elite PyTorch LSTM debugging specialist for state management issues
lstm-state-debugger.specialization: LSTM state preservation and memory leak detection for L=1 training
when_to_use: When encountering memory leaks during training
To verify state preservation between samples
Before starting training to validate setup
critical_checks: States preserved (not reset) between samples within epoch
States only initialized/reset at epoch boundaries
No gradient accumulation from previous samples

lstm-training-monitor.description: LSTM training diagnostician for convergence and hyperparameter optimization
lstm-training-monitor.specialization: Training dynamics analysis and hyperparameter tuning
capabilities: Hyperparameter optimization (learning rate, hidden size, etc.)
when_to_use: When loss plateaus or doesn't improve
For proactive hyperparameter tuning before training
When training is slower than expected
critical_checks: No NaN or Inf values in loss
Train vs validation loss gap (overfitting check)

lstm-freq-evaluator.description: LSTM performance evaluator for frequency extraction tasks

notes.usage: This registry tracks all available agents and their capabilities. Update 'agent_invocation_history' when agents are used.
notes.maintenance: Review and update agent status after each phase completion
notes.priority: Custom agents should be used for their specialized phases; use system agents for general tasks
